Name: Labrador Retriever
Details: Labradors are one of the most popular dog breeds, known for their friendliness and intelligence.

Name: German Shepherd
Details: German Shepherds are known for their loyalty and are often used in police and military work.

Name: Siberian Husky
Details: Siberian Huskies are known for their thick coat and sled-pulling history in cold climates.

Name: Beagle
Details: Beagles are small scent hounds originally bred for hunting hare and known for their tracking skills.
